TopicTitle: How do you change the thread prefix from unanswered to answered?

Articles.Content: How do you change the thread prefix from unanswered to answered? I can't find the information in the forum rules nor with a thread title search. Perhaps because I'm new and subject to moderation I don't yet have the privileges but otherwise, how is it done? Thanks.
Edit the first post, then choose "go advanced." You'll see the option to change the prefix on the upper left. (Also, thread moved to Kerbal Network.)
